returns._0: newNFTId The id of the NFT
All the items a user has listed
Returns all the items that a user has purchased

params.price: The new Price of the NFT

buy(uint256).notice: Allows a user to buy an NFT that is on the Marketplace

createNFT(string,uint256).notice: Mints a NFT and lists it in the marketplace

fetchItemsListed().notice: Returns only items a user has listed

fetchMyNFTs().notice: Returns only items that a user has purchased

fetchNFTs().notice: Returns all unsold market items, all the items that are currently beeing sold

getListingPrice().notice: Returns the listing price of the contract

resellNFT(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows someone to resell a NFT they have purchased

updateListingPrice(uint256).notice: Updates the listing price of the contract
